div.div: The Leadership team along with the Board of Trustees are closely monitoring all developments and will quickly move to make a decision in the best interest of our community. The health and safety of our community is paramount. We may not be able to make a decision until Governor Cuomo issues an Executive Order or takes further action that continues PAUSE in New York State. We are taking every step to maintain the social-emotional and academic well-being of students as remote learning continues to take place.
As soon as we are able, we will share that decision and future plans with you. We will let you know the decision for AOC closure shortly. AOC will remain closed until April 29th at this point.
Our AOC community remains strong and vibrant. We will persevere and remain strong together. Please continue to be safe and well.

Take care,
Richard Lee
Executive Director
